title: Technical Problem
body: When I tried to open game this morning I got the error like 1000 times  " we have restored this installation to an older version" and game restarted itself 1000 times. And I couldn't play then I deleted game to re-install. Now I got the error "unspecified error occurred please check logs". Can someone help me please!!!

replies.body: I'm seeing quite a lot of this weird patcher loop problem this morning. I was told that the devs have been able to fix everything by now, but still hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you can't get signed in.
